title: Launch 'Call Before You Dig' Campaign
description: The public affairs department is launching a public awareness campaign to remind people to call 811 before any digging projects.

tasks.description: Draft the content for the campaign, including social media posts, bill inserts, and radio ads.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates various pieces of marketing content with a consistent message.

tasks.description: Schedule the distribution of the content across the various channels for the spring season, when digging projects increase.
Track the number of 811 calls before and during the campaign to measure its effectiveness.
tasks.expected_outcome: System is set up to monitor and report on campaign metrics.
